They’re very social animals, and make excellent pets.

chosen.content: Is it illegal to BitTorrent content in the United States? Why or not why?
On a legal basis, it is not illegal to download content through a BitTorrent network, provided you don’t infringe on other copyrights.
What constitutes infringing on copyright?

Basically, downloading copyrighted content without permission from the copyright holder is infringing.  In particular, downloading content from a publicly accessible resource like a BitTorrent network without the copyright holder’s permission is infringing.

rejected.content: Is it illegal to BitTorrent content in the United States? Why or not why?
On a legal basis, it is not illegal to download content through a BitTorrent network, provided you don’t infringe on other copyrights.
What constitutes infringing on copyright?

Copyright covers both publication and performance. You can use a work in performance without violating copyright, but it requires permission. For example, you can play a song on your guitar, but only if you obtain a license from the composer, or as part of a musical performance.

chosen.content: I want to make a pumpkin pie for Thanksgiving, but I've never made one before.  How do I make a pumpkin pie?

There are many variations on pumpkin pie recipes, but here’s one of my favorites:

4 eggs

3⁄4 cup pumpkin puree

1 cup sugar

1⁄2 cup brown sugar

2 cups all-purpose flour

1⁄2 teaspoon baking powder

1⁄2 teaspoon salt

1 teaspoon cinnamon

1 teaspoon ground cloves

1 teaspoon nutmeg

1 teaspoon allspice

1⁄4 teaspoon ground ginger

2/3 cup butter, melted

Preheat oven to 400 degrees. In a medium bowl, beat eggs. Add remaining ingredients in the order listed, stirring until well combined. Pour into a 9-inch pie pan and bake for 45 minutes to one hour. Cool to room temperature before serving. Enjoy!
